forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
